item.title: Giving is the Key to Receiving
item.description: Oh, the joys of those who are kind to the poor! The Lord rescues them when they are in trouble. The Lord protects them and keeps them alive. He gives them prosperity in the land and rescues them from their enemies. Psalm 41:1-2 NLT Whoever gives to the poor will lack nothing, but those who close their eyes to poverty will be cursed. Proverbs 28:27 NLT And whoever gives a cup of cold water to one of my humble disciples, I promise you, he will not go unrewarded.
